definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with
to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: The Leaders expressed deep concern over the destabilising effect of regional conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 双方领导人对地区冲突带来的不稳定影响深表忧虑。

sentences.english: Salim Salim says regional conflicts are undermining all progress.
sentences.chinese: 萨利姆说，地区冲突破坏了所有的进展。

sentences.english: Both sides also exchanged opinions on regional conflicts and the Korean Peninsular nuclear issue.
sentences.chinese: 双方还就地区冲突和朝鲜半岛核问题等交换了意见。
